author: jycli
msg: A patch to fix Bug XALANJ-1708

author: johng
msg: This patch makes the close() function behave better but still has a
problem when certain iterators are used.  This code is at least safe
It also fixes a minor bug in the default connection pool
CVS:   If this change addresses a PR in the problem report tracking
